name: Website Design & Build
shortDescription: Custom websites designed to convert visitors into customers and grow your business.
heroDescription: Get a professional, custom-designed website that represents your brand, converts visitors into leads, and helps your business grow. We handle everything from design to launch.

deliverables.title: Custom Design
deliverables.description: A unique design tailored to your brand, not a generic template

deliverables.title: Mobile-First Development
deliverables.description: Responsive design that looks great on all devices

deliverables.title: SEO Foundation
deliverables.description: Built-in SEO best practices for better search visibility

deliverables.title: Fast Loading Speed
deliverables.description: Optimized performance for better user experience and rankings

deliverables.title: Contact Forms
deliverables.description: Lead capture forms to convert visitors into customers

deliverables.title: Content Management
deliverables.description: Easy-to-update system so you can make changes yourself

whoItsFor: Small businesses needing their first professional website
Service businesses wanting to attract more local customers
Companies with outdated websites that no longer represent their brand
Entrepreneurs launching a new business or product

process.title: Discovery
process.description: We learn about your business, goals, and target audience

process.title: Design
process.description: We create mockups and refine until you love it

process.title: Build
process.description: We develop your site with modern, fast technology

process.title: Launch
process.description: We deploy, test, and hand over the keys

seo.title: Website Design & Build Services
seo.description: Professional website design and development for small businesses. Get a custom, fast-loading website that converts visitors into customers.
